text: Sinni Rabbil koroositeeh, kay farmoytit dirabboyse mari ken taamoomi bakarbakaaray bacaril yaniy bakaare num lee yakkaley, kay fanah yamaate waqdi usuk tuh kah suge weeh inna, kaadu tokkel Yalli aracal gulguluh kaah (korosta kinnuk) sugaah kay uma taamah galt√≥ kaah duudusah, Yalli cisab sissikik toogimi too xagana assexeere waay
